snippet: Mets pitcher Jon Niese received a cortisone injection in the back of his left elbow on Monday and was cleared to resume throwing later this week.
abstract: New York Mets pitcher Jon Niese receives a cortisone injection in the back of his left elbow and is cleared to resume throwing; Mets say he does not have ligament damage; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Mets pitcher Jon Niese received a cortisone injection in the back of his left elbow on Monday and was cleared to resume throwing later this week.
